text: Roy Stolk (born 11 January 1979 in Leiden) is a Dutch former professional snooker player. Between 2006 and 2007, he was on the Main Tour by winning the Polish Open. At the end of the season, he slipped off. ==References== ==External links== * * Profile at globalsnooker.co.uk * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch snooker players Category:Sportspeople from Leiden
title: Roy Stolk
